### collectDebugValues() {#ad4be5f038126109bb661828d2f22427b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LiveDebugVariables::LDVImpl::collectDebugValues (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; mf, bool InstrRef)</>}>
Collect and erase all DBG&#95;VALUE instructions, adding a UserValue def for each instruction.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="mf"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> to be scanned.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="InstrRef">Whether to operate in instruction referencing mode. If true, most of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/livedebugvariables">LiveDebugVariables</a> doesn&#39;t run.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if any debug values were found.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livedebugvariables-cpp/#l00598">598</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livedebugvariables-cpp">LiveDebugVariables.cpp</a>.

### handleDebugInstr() {#a85bdfa4d7f68fdfd3d6c761729ccd778}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock::iterator LiveDebugVariables::LDVImpl::handleDebugInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Idx)</>}>
Track variable location debug instructions while using the instruction referencing implementation.

Such debug instructions do not need to be updated during regalloc because they identify instructions rather than register locations. However, they needs to be removed from the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> during regalloc, then re-inserted later, to avoid disrupting the allocator.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="MI"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> DBG&#95;VALUE / DBG&#95;INSTR&#95;REF / DBG&#95;PHI instruction</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Idx">Last valid <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> before instruction</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
Iterator to continue processing from after unlinking.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livedebugvariables-cpp/#l00624">624</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livedebugvariables-cpp">LiveDebugVariables.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
